item.title: Car Pre Delivery Inspection Checklist (PDI)
item.description: What is a Car PDI? Don’t be surprised with PDI jargon. PDI is simply an acronym for “Pre-Delivery Inspection” and it is an important process which you should perform on your car before taking the delivery. Taking a car delivery happens once/twice in a lifetime and of course it is a happy lifetime moment for you and your family. While the day seem to be quite exciting, you should never forget to perform PDI on your car coming up with some excuses.
